title: 12/09/2020 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 12/09/2020 - Best of The Herd
description:
-The Cowboys are a mess and will be for a while

-Covid hurt the good programs in College Football, not the great ones

-Lamar Jackson is special, the criticism of him is absurd

-Colin has the same problem with the Steelers he always has

-There is a franchise that would be a perfect fit for Carson Wentz


Guest: Joel Klatt, FOX Sports CFB Analyst

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
